rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall integrated with a living area to welcome natural light. Features large windows and French doors facing the garden for improved ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area with an open layout to foster social interaction and natural lighting from clerestory windows.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Servant's Quarters Access
rooms.description: Well-equipped kitchen designed with energy efficiency in mind. The layout includes a dedicated area leading to the servant's quarters, ensuring privacy and functional space.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet nook with ample shelving for books. Large windows ensure natural light and an inviting ambience.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: A compact living space designed for the servants with basic amenities, strategically located to maintain privacy yet accessible.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated office space that benefits from north-facing windows and natural light, promoting a focused work environment. Vastu alignment considered for energy flow.
